name: Smoky Bloody Mary
garnish: Lemon and smoked salt rim, Kale, Celery, Bacon, Pickled vegetables
preparation:
Pour some smoked salt onto a small plate.
Rub the juicy side of the lemon wedge along the lip of a pint glass.
Roll the outer edge of the glass in smoked salt until fully coated.
Add all the ingredients to a pint glass with ice and stir.
Garnish with kale, celery, bacon and pickled veggies.
